name: CTech Startups Category
notes: Selector targets the div containing the headline. Text content will be passed to LLM for company name extraction and description.

name: Seedtable Israel Startups
notes: Selector targets the div containing the company name. Direct name extraction. Description generated from name only.

name: Startup Nation Central Finder
notes: Selector targets name div in 'Trending Investments'. Requires LLM for name cleaning & description. Might miss companies listed in other sections. CURRENTLY NOT WORKING.

name: Geektime Funding Category
notes: Selector targets the main content block of a funding news item. Requires LLM for name extraction and description.

name: Forbes Israel Entrepreneurship
notes: Selector targets the text block (title + excerpt) of an article. Requires LLM for name extraction and description.

name: Team8 Portfolio
notes: Selector targets the container for each portfolio company. Requires LLM for name extraction and description.
